name: Víctor José Gallego Fontenla
about: My name is Víctor, I'm a PhD student at the Centro Singular de Investigación de Tecnoloxías Intelixentes of the Universidade de Santiago de Compostela. I've recieved my BSc degree in Computer Science from the Universidade de Santiago de Compostela in 2015, and my MSc degree in Artificial Intelligence in 2017 from the Universidad Internacional Menendez Pelayo. My research is focused on process mining, specifically on the  detection of process changes during their execution.
affiliation: Centro Singular de Investigación en Tecnoloxías da Información
